questions.question_text_1: From among the following identify the set of concrete test inputs that all the instances of symbolic execution.

questions.question_text_1: A software organization wants to develop a file sharing platform for its customers. As a part of requirement gathering process, the developers team explore the requirements pertaining to the data privacy, security, accessibility, or other legal compliance. What kind of requirements these are?
